import {IoMdSunny, IoMdRainy, IoMdCloudy, IoMdSnow,IoMdThunderstorm, IoMdSearch} from 'react-icons/io'; import {BsArrowUp, BsArrowDown, BsThermometer, BsWind, BsWater} from 'react-icons/bs'; function CurrentWeather(props){ return ( <>

{props.name}

Tuesday | 9 May 2023 | Local time: 12:00am

{props.temp}25 째C

High: 25{props.temp_max}째C

Low: 24{props.temp_min}째C

Feels like 31{props.feels_like}째C

Wind 3{props.speed}m/s

Humidity: 70{props.humidity}%

) } export default CurrentWeather;
